channel.title: Contest on Silvano DAL ZILIO

item.title: Behind the Scene of the Model Checking Contest, Analysis of Results from 2018 to 2023
item.author: dalzilio [at] laas [dot] fr (Silvano DAL ZILIO)
item.description:
Nicolas Amat, Elvio Amparore, Bernard Berthomieu, Pierre Bouvier, Silvano Dal Zilio, Francis Hulin-Hubard, Peter Gjøl Jensen, Loïg Jezequel, Fabrice Kordon, Shuo Li, Emmanuel Paviot-Adet, Laure Petrucci, Jiří Srba, Yann Thierry-Mieg, Karsten Wolf
In TOOLympics Challenge 2023 — Updates, Results, Successes of the Formal-Methods Competitions, nov 2024.

item.title: Presentation of the 9th Edition of the Model Checking Contest
item.author: dalzilio [at] laas [dot] fr (Silvano DAL ZILIO)
item.description:
Elvio Amparore, Bernard Berthomieu, Gianfranco Ciardo, Silvano Dal Zilio, Francesco Gallà, Lom Messan Hillah, Francis Hulin-Hubard, Peter Gjøl Jensen, Loïg Jezequel, Fabrice Kordon, Didier Le Botlan, Torsten Liebke, Jeroen Meijer, Andrew Miner, Emmanuel Paviot-Adet, Jiří Srba, Yann Thierry-Mieg, Tom van Dijk, Karsten Wolf
In TACAS 2019 — Tools and Algorithms for the Construction and Analysis of Systems, apr 2019.
